issues.title: Use of `eval()` with untrusted input
issues.message: The function `dangerous_eval` calls `eval()` directly on user-controlled input. This allows arbitrary code execution.

issues.title: Unescaped format string in HTTP response
issues.message: User input (`request.args.get('name')`) is returned directly in the HTTP response. This may enable cross-site scripting (XSS).
